00030         void CPluginManager::Run(const char* paramsFile)
00031         {
00032                 LoadCorePlugins();
00033 
00034                 // parse settings file
00035                 if(paramsFile)
00036                 {
00037                         LogTrace("[Init] Loading core settings file");
00038                         mCoreParams = new CoreParams;
00039                         if(!mCoreParams->ParseFile(paramsFile))
00040                         {
00041                                 LogWarning("[Init] Loading failed, proceeding with default settings");
00042                                 delete mCoreParams;
00043                                 mCoreParams = 0;
00044                         }
00045                 }
00046 
00047                 LoadPlugins();
00048 
00049                 if(mCoreParams) { delete mCoreParams; mCoreParams = 0; }
00050         }

00053 
00054         CPluginManager::~CPluginManager()
00055         {
00056                 // Shutting down used shadows in reverse to its creation order
00057                 std::for_each(mCreationStack.rbegin(), mCreationStack.rend(),
00058                         boost::bind(&CPluginShadow::Shutdown, _1));
00059 
00060                 // Release plug-in graph (now released all loaded modules)
00061                 std::for_each(mShadows.begin(), mShadows.end(),
00062                         boost::bind(&IUnknown::Release,
00063                         boost::bind(&TShadowMap::value_type::second, _1)));
00064         }

00069         // Core plug-ins
00071 
00072         module::HResult CPluginManager::LoadCorePlugins()
00073         {
00074                 LogTrace("[Init] Loading core plug-ins");
00075 
00076                 // Initializing core-plugin
00077                 CPluginShadow *pShadow = CreatePluginShadow("core", 1);
00078                 pShadow->mExportTable.insert(CLSID_CCore);
00079                 CreateExtensionPoint(pShadow, "startlisteners", uuid_of(IStartListener));
00080 
00081                 // Initializing file system
00082                 return SF_S_OK;
00083         }

00088         // Plug-in loading
00090 
00091         void CPluginManager::LoadPlugins()
00092         {
00093                 LogTrace("[Init] Loading regular plug-ins");
00094 
00095                 // Find all xml files
00096                 std::vector<path> deffiles;
00097                 deffiles.reserve(50);
00098                 FindDefinitionFiles(deffiles);
00099 
00100                 // Parse them and pass them a visitors
00101                 std::vector<CPluginDefVisitor> visitors(deffiles.size());
00102                 ParseDefinitions(visitors, deffiles);
00103 
00104                 // Create shadows
00105                 CreateShadows(visitors);
00106                 // Delayed step, so that all shadows would be accessible
00107                 BindPlugins(visitors);
00108 
00109                 LogInfoAlways("[Init] %d plug-ins loaded", mShadows.size());
00110         }

00113 
00114         void CPluginManager::FindDefinitionFiles(std::vector<path>& files)
00115         {
00116                 stack_string<8> ext = ".xml";
00117 
00118                 directory_iterator dir(path::current_dir());
00119 
00120                 while(dir)
00121                 {
00122                         path current = dir.current();
00123 
00124                         if(current.is_file() && *ext == current.extension())
00125                                 files.push_back(current);
00126 
00127                         ++dir;
00128                 }
00129         }

00132 
00133         void CPluginManager::ParseDefinitions(
00134                 std::vector<CPluginDefVisitor> &visitors,
00135                 std::vector<path> &files)
00136         {
00137                 for(size_t i = 0, size = files.size(); i < size; ++i)
00138                 {
00139                         try
00140                         {
00141                                 TiXmlDocument doc;
00142                                 doc.LoadFile(files[i].c_str());
00143 
00144                                 if(!doc.FirstChild())
00145                                 {
00146                                         LogErrorAlways("XML parsing failed, file: %s", files[i].c_str());
00147                                         continue;
00148                                 }
00149 
00150                                 doc.Accept(&visitors[i]);
00151                         }
00152                         catch(module::Exception& ex)
00153                         {
00154                                 visitors[i].PluginName.clear();
00155                                 LogErrorAlways("Plugin definition load failed: %s, in %s", ex.message(), files[i].c_str());
00156                                 continue;
00157                         }
00158 
00159                         // Check the settings
00160                         if(mCoreParams && !mCoreParams->ShouldLoad(visitors[i].PluginName.c_str()))
00161                         {
00162                                 LogTrace("[init] Ignoring %s plugin by filter...", visitors[i].PluginName.c_str());
00163                                 visitors[i].PluginName.clear();
00164                         }
00165                 }
00166         }

00169 
00170         void CPluginManager::CreateShadows(std::vector<CPluginDefVisitor>& visitors)
00171         {
00172                 for(size_t i = 0; i < visitors.size(); ++i)
00173                 {
00174                         // If plugin parsed successfully
00175                         if(!visitors[i].PluginName.size()) continue;
00176 
00177                         CPluginShadow *pShadow = CreatePluginShadow(visitors[i].PluginName, visitors[i].Version);
00178 
00179                         // Filling the export table
00180                         for(CPluginDefVisitor::TExports::const_iterator it = visitors[i].Exports.begin();
00181                                 it != visitors[i].Exports.end(); ++it)
00182                         {
00183                                 pShadow->mExportTable.insert((*it)->ClassGUID);
00184                         }
00185 
00186                         // Filling the extension points
00187                         for(CPluginDefVisitor::TExtensionPoints::const_iterator it = visitors[i].ExtensionPoints.begin();
00188                                 it != visitors[i].ExtensionPoints.end();
00189                                 ++it)
00190                         {
00191                                 CreateExtensionPoint(pShadow, (*it)->PointID, (*it)->InterfaceID);
00192                         }
00193                 }
00194         }
00195 
00197 
00198         void CPluginManager::BindPlugins(std::vector<CPluginDefVisitor>& visitors)
00199         {
00201                 for(size_t i = 0; i < visitors.size(); ++i)
00202                 {
00203                         // If plugin parsed successfully
00204                         if(!visitors[i].PluginName.size()) continue;
00205 
00206                         // For each extension
00207                         for(CPluginDefVisitor::TExtensions::iterator it = visitors[i].Extensions.begin();
00208                                 it != visitors[i].Extensions.end(); ++it)
00209                         {
00210                                 std::string extendee, point;
00211                                 ParseExtesionPoint((*it)->PointID, extendee, point);
00212 
00213                                 // Find extendee & provider
00214                                 CPluginShadow *pExtender = mShadows.find(visitors[i].PluginName)->second;
00215                                 TShadowMap::const_iterator sme = mShadows.find(extendee);
00216                                 if(sme == mShadows.end())
00217                                 {
00218                                         LogWarningAlways("Extendee not found: %s", extendee.c_str());
00219                                         continue;
00220                                 }
00221                                 CPluginShadow *pExtendee = sme->second;
00222 
00223                                 // Find extension point
00224                                 IExtensionPoint *pPoint = pExtendee->FindExtensionPoint(point);
00225                                 if(!pPoint)
00226                                 {
00227                                         LogWarningAlways("Extension point not found: %s", point.c_str());
00228                                         continue;
00229                                 }
00230 
00231                                 // Create new extension object
00232                                 IExtension *pExtension = CreateExtension(pExtender, pPoint, (*it)->ClassID, (*it)->PropertyMap);
00233                         }
00234                 }
00235         }

00242         CPluginShadow* CPluginManager::CreatePluginShadow(const std::string& name, int version)
00243         {
00244                 LogTrace("[Init] Creating plug-in shadow: %s", name.c_str());
00245 
00246                 CPluginShadow *pShadow;
00247                 create_instance_impl<CPluginShadow>(&pShadow);
00248                 pShadow->FinalConstruct(name, version);
00249 
00250                 mShadows.insert(std::make_pair(name, pShadow));
00251                 return pShadow;
00252         }

00256         CExtensionPoint* CPluginManager::CreateExtensionPoint(CPluginShadow* provider, const std::string &name, const module::guid &iid)
00257         {
00258                 LogTrace("[Init] Creating extension point: %s", name.c_str());
00259 
00260                 CExtensionPoint *pEP;
00261                 create_instance_impl<CExtensionPoint>(&pEP);
00262                 pEP->mName = name;
00263                 pEP->mFullName = provider->PluginName() + "::" + name;
00264                 pEP->mInterfaceID = iid;
00265                 pEP->mProvider = provider;
00266                 provider->mExtensionPoints.push_back(pEP);
00267 
00268                 return pEP;
00269         }

00272 
00273         CExtension* CPluginManager::CreateExtension(CPluginShadow* extender,
00274                 IExtensionPoint* exPoint, const module::guid& classID, std::map<std::string, std::string>& paramMap)
00275         {
00276                 LogTrace("[Init] Creating extension, point: %s", exPoint->UniqueID().c_str());
00277 
00278                 CExtension *pEx;
00279                 create_instance_impl<CExtension>(&pEx);
00280                 pEx->pExtender = extender;
00281                 pEx->pExtensionPoint = exPoint;
00282                 pEx->mImplClassID = classID;
00283                 std::swap(pEx->mParameterMap, paramMap);
00284 
00285                 extender->mExtensions.push_back(pEx);
00286                 CExtensionPoint *pEP = static_cast<CExtensionPoint*>(exPoint);
00287                 pEP->mExtensions.push_back(pEx);
00288 
00289                 return pEx;
00290         }

00293         // Runtime
00295 
00296         HResult CPluginManager::OnPluginLoad(CPluginShadow *pShadow)
00297         {
00298                 // Initializes plugin and puts it to creation stack
00299                 LogTrace("Loading plugin binary: %s", pShadow->ModuleName().c_str());
00300                 mCreationStack.push_back(pShadow);
00301 
00302                 com_ptr<IPlugin> plugin;
00303                 pShadow->CreateInstance(UUID_PPV(IPlugin, plugin.wrapped()));
00304                 if(plugin)
00305                         plugin->Initialize(gEnv->Core->Environment(), pShadow);
00306                 return SF_S_OK;
00307         }

00311         // Service
00313 
00314         IPluginShadow* CPluginManager::FindPluginShadow(const std::string &name)
00315         {
00316                 std::string n(name);
00317                 std::transform(n.begin(), n.end(), n.begin(), tolower);
00318                 TShadowMap::const_iterator it = mShadows.find(n);
00319                 if(it != mShadows.end())
00320                         return it->second;
00321 
00322                 return 0;
00323         }
00324 
00326 
00327         IExtensionPoint* CPluginManager::FindExtensionPoint(const std::string &name)
00328         {
00329                 std::string plugin, point;
00330                 ParseExtesionPoint(name, plugin, point);
00331                 std::transform(plugin.begin(), plugin.end(), plugin.begin(), tolower);
00332                 std::transform(point.begin(), point.end(), point.begin(), tolower);
00333 
00334                 if(!point.size()) return 0;
00335 
00336                 IPluginShadow *pShadow = FindPluginShadow(plugin);
00337                 if(!pShadow) return 0;
00338 
00339                 return pShadow->FindExtensionPoint(point);
00340         }
00341 
00343 
00344         void CPluginManager::ParseExtesionPoint(const std::string& str, std::string& plugin, std::string& point)
00345         {
00346                 size_t sep = str.find("::");
00347                 if(sep == std::string::npos) { plugin = str; return; }
00348 
00349                 plugin = str.substr(0, sep);
00350                 point = str.substr(sep + 2, std::string::npos);
00351         }
